comments:
I am unable to reproduce this consistently, but on startup, I received a RuntimeException that was logged to the console (not the .log file). This happened when launching from a dev instance of eclipse, with the 1.5.2-200610190423 build of webtools. My launched instance was open in the j2ee perspective; and the workspace had one web project in it. I have also received the error from https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=115821 on startup using the same wtp build, causing the package explorer to not be able to load (this only happened once though).

Here is the RuntimeException stack trace:
